short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape website in seconds with our web scraper tool.Easy-to-use,fast,and free interface for hassle-free scraping

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛠️ 𝗪𝗲𝗯 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻: Effortlessly scrape web data with ease!
💡 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗜𝘁 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀: Use Web Scraper to extract data from a list of websites in just a few steps.
📋 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀:
𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗨𝗥𝗟𝘀:  List all the website URLs you want to scrape.
    1.𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝗫𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘀: Include the Full Xpaths of the data elements you want to extract.
    2. 𝗟𝗼𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮:Load the URLs and Xpaths into the extension.
    3. 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗴: Hit the 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗲  button to begin extracting data from the listed websites.
It's that simple! Start scraping your desired web data in no time. 🖱️🚀
